Translations.Text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne distracted vashymy hroshamy ta vashymy ditʹmy z pam'yatayuchoho BOHA. Tsey khto roblyatʹ tse yavlyayutʹ soboyu losers

Vy budete daty z nashykh umov vam pered tym, yak smertʹ prybuvaye do vas, todi vy kazhete, "Miy Lord, yakby tilʹky Vy mohly zatrymaty tse dlya korotke v toy chas, yak! YA by todi budu blahodiynyy ta pryyednuyusʹ spravedlyvyy
BOH nikoly ne zatrymuye pryznachenyy chas smerti dlya budʹ-yakoyi dushi. BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
